game.name: Cranium Conundrum
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cranium Conundrum is a physics-based puzzle platformer taking place in the dream worlds that you create!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cranium Conundrum is a physics-based puzzle platformer taking place in the dream worlds that you create!
